wikipedia_page.main: Richard Shoebridge (born 12 August 1985 in Johannesburg, South Africa) is a British short track speed skater who competed at the 2014 Winter Olympics.Shoebridge was part of the British 5,000m relay team that broke the world record in February 2011.

response: **Men's 5000m relay:   (Michael Gilday, Charles Hamelin, François Hamelin, François-Louis Tremblay) 6:49.723   (Eley, Richard Shoebridge, Paul Stanley, Jack Whelbourne) 6:50.277   (Kwak, Lee Ho-Suk, Lee Jung-Su, Noh) 6:50.311
